content: Seminar by Thierry Fournel - Université Jean MonnetSeminar by Thierry FournelGo to contentGo to searchGo to menuMenuMain menuThe labTeamsJobsNewsPlatformsEducationMaps/ContactTools menuEUR Manutech SleightIntranetUJM website (FR)enSearchSearchIntranetEUR MANUTECH-SLEIGHTThe labEditoPresentationOrganization chartsStaffYearbooksThe labTeamsFunctional Materials and SurfacesMaterials for Optics and Photonics in Extreme Radiation EnvironmentsLaser-Matter InteractionImage Science & Computer VisionData IntelligenceSecure Embedded Systems & Hardware ArchitecturesTeamsJobsNewsPlatformsNanoSaintÉtiennePETRA - Radiative TestsElectron microscopyFemtosecond laserElectronics and Hardware SecurityComputer clusterPlatformsEducationUniversity degreesInstitutionsEducationMaps/ContactMapsDirectionsContactMaps/ContactYou are here: > Teams > Image Science & Computer Vision > Seminars > by lab researchers > Seminar by Thierry Fournel"Optical PUFs: introduction and spectral viewpoint" by Thierry FournelThe Thursday, March 9, 2017from 1:30 PM to 2:30 PMroom F021b, Laboratoire Hubert Curien, 42000 Saint EtienneSeminar by Thierry Fournel, Professor at Laboratoire Hubert CurienAbstractPhysical Unclonable Functions (PUFs) and their ability to authenticate thanks to their challenge-response behavior will be introduced. The original construction which considered optical systems as physical one-way functions will be detailed. A new direction aiming to design “spectral PUFs" will be suggested. Attend this seminarFunctional Materials and SurfacesResearch areasStaffPublicationsProjects and partnersNews/EventsSeminarsJob opportunitiesContactMaterials for Optics and Photonics in Extreme Radiation EnvironmentsResearch areasStaffPublicationsProjects and partnersNews/EventsSeminarsJob opportunitiesContactLaser-Matter InteractionResearch areasStaffPublicationsProjects and partnersNews/EventsSeminarsJob opportunitiesContactImage Science & Computer VisionResearch areasStaffPublicationsNews/EventsSeminarsJob opportunitiesContactData IntelligenceResearch areasStaffPublicationsSoftwaresProjects & partnersNews/EventsSeminarsJob opportunitiesContactSecure Embedded Systems & Hardware ArchitecturesResearch areasStaffPublicationsProjects and PartnersNews/EventsWorkshops and ConferencesSeminarsJob opportunitiesContactMaps/ContactLegal notices
